atk_abil: Normal Attack: Slows down many enemies and summons vines that deal damage. ( Four-footed units become slower than two-footed units. )
Skill Attack: Damages and knocks back the enemy in front by creating a wind drill
Special Ability 1: increase the basic speed of the game by 2% ( If double speed applied, the game speed increases by 2.04 times, Cumulative )
Special Ability 2: The accompanying eagle attacks an enemy. Knocks back and stuns the enemy for a certain amount of time.
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Slows down many enemies and summons vines that deal damage. ( Four-footed units become slower than two-footed units. )
Skill Attack: Damages and knocks back the enemy in front by creating a wind drill
Special Ability 1: increase the basic speed of the game by 5% ( If double speed applied, the game speed increases by 2.1 times, Cumulative )
Special Ability 2: The accompanying eagle attacks an enemy. Knocks back and stuns the enemy for a certain amount of time.

buffs.description: This unit has no particular buffs but is good to have as a one of for Tower of Trials and Spirit Highlands.
buffs.name: None
